author: bachtis
body:
As promised here is the backport of the 71X PFclustering with time code in 62X_SLHC. 
Since everyting is rewritten the old Phase I HCAL superclustering  needs to be reconfigured properly 
.but still works [note that this is not default in the release]. After this PR I will submit config files to run the old Phase I HCAL Superclustering on this release.
title: PF Clustering  with timing cuts for ECAL
